title: Smart Portfolio Website
description: A responsive personal portfolio website built to showcase projects, skills, and experiences using modern web technologies.

title: Crave House
description: A beautiful and responsive restaurant landing page built with ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, Vite, and a Custom API. This project showcases a modern and interactive web experience for users to explore delicious dishes, view ingredients, and manage their cart seamlessly.

title: Transparency Bangladesh
description: An anti-corruption platform that allows users to report issues, visualize data, and access educational resources on corruption.

title: Task Flow Manager
description: A task and project management tool for small teams, with deadlines, priority tagging, and collaborative boards.

title: BlogSphere
description: A blogging platform where users can write, edit, and publish articles with markdown support and SEO optimization.
